data.title: Film Festival: Lída Baarová (The Devil's Mistress)>
data.meta_description:
The annual Czech film festival titled “Czech That Film” was established in 2012. Currently, it is the largest Czech cultural event in the United States. It is a film festival of the best recent Czech films held throughout the United States every year, with a range of screenings and discussion with cast and crew. 
Films are shown in 15 cities around the country.  Austin screenings are on April 5, 11, and 18.
 
On April 5, an opening reception with director Filip Renč will begin at 6:15pm. Film begins at 7:00pm.
 
Tickets are on sale now at the Violet Crown and online.
 
April 5: Lída Baarová (The Devil's Mistress), with director Filip Renč in attendance.
